basics.name: Joao Paulo Pozo Lindgren
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Experienced Brazilian .Net developer lifelong learner, striving to always get better learning new techniques and technologies. I do not seek it just because it is my job, but because it is my passion. I am interested in SOLID principles, TDD, DDD, CQRS, Javascript as a whole and functional programming techniques.

work.summary: Senior .net developer with full stack role in several areas of a GRC software product. Lately, one of the leaders of the feature team with focus on deliveries and high quality tests of our software API.
highlights: Lead developer of the API team. Led the last product release.
Worked at the 2016 Brazil Olympics Games Command&Control solution.
Created in the Workflow Team the first 'NoSql like' solution using apache lucene as solution (our company has several restrictions installing software at some customers).
As a member of the Workflow module team, reworked the module front-end from a asp.net web form to a javascript/json focused on calling API endpoints.

work.summary: FGV is one the best university of Brazil and I worked as Senior asp.net developer in the software that managed the financial and academic information of students of the institution. Our stack at the time included asp.net webforms, nhibernate, webservices/wcf and sql server as storage
highlights: Worked at FGVOnline, the section of the university that took care of distance education.
Created the backend of the FGVOnline portal (http://www5.fgv.br/fgvonline/).
Worked in the integration between the financial, academic and the system that controls the exams of the students.

work.company: TJERJ (Court of Justice of the State of Rio de Janeiro)
work.summary: I was part of the team that automated the generation of tickets for payment of court fees through the internet. Our system in java/.net is still responsible until today for generating the guides of judicial gatherings of all the process of first instance of the court of justice of Rio de Janeiro/Brazil.
highlights: Development of the backend systems in .net responsible for populate the front java system with data from the Court.
Participation in the creation of the main app in Java (called Eletronic GRERJ) and its integration with legacy systems.
After more than 8 years this is still the solution used by thousands of users of the Court to pay court fees in legal proceedings. Despite having an old look, it still works great!

work.summary: ABNote is a leading global supplier of secure documents. There, I participated in the team that worked on the system that controlled the emission and generation of the driver's license in all the Brazilian territory.
